entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo @ChrisCuomo My Pop taught me that people have to work. No one wants to see any one die but our state and county has to get back to work. Address the Coronavirus issue but get people back to work. The current situation is not sustainable.
